Precompiled Libraries



  • Expand All
  • Collapse All

Included page: .FlexOvl.DeviceManagement.SetUp (edit)

import
com.alliander.osgp.acceptancetests

script
start scoped giv wen zen for slim devicemanagement Test not run


Narrative

As OSGP I want to set event notifications for a device

Scenario: set event notifications

scenario success input values device notifications ismessagesent result description
given a valid set event notifications request with @device and @notifications
and the set event notifications request refers to an existing device @device that will always respond OK
and the set event notifications request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when the set event notifications request is received on OSGP
then the set event notifications request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId @device
and a set event notifications oslp message is sent to device @device should be @ismessagesent
and an ovl set event notifications result message with result @result and description @description should be sent to the ovl out queue

success input values
device notifications ismessagesent result description
device1 LIGHT_EVENTS true OK
scenario success input values device notifications ismessagesent result description
given a valid set event notifications request with device1 and LIGHT_EVENTS
and the set event notifications request refers to an existing device device1 that will always respond OK
and the set event notifications request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when the set event notifications request is received on OSGP
then the set event notifications request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device1
and a set event notifications oslp message is sent to device device1 should be true
and an ovl set event notifications result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue
device1 TARIFF_EVENTS true OK
scenario success input values device notifications ismessagesent result description
given a valid set event notifications request with device1 and TARIFF_EVENTS
and the set event notifications request refers to an existing device device1 that will always respond OK
and the set event notifications request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when the set event notifications request is received on OSGP
then the set event notifications request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device1
and a set event notifications oslp message is sent to device device1 should be true
and an ovl set event notifications result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue
device1 COMM_EVENTS true OK
scenario success input values device notifications ismessagesent result description
given a valid set event notifications request with device1 and COMM_EVENTS
and the set event notifications request refers to an existing device device1 that will always respond OK
and the set event notifications request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when the set event notifications request is received on OSGP
then the set event notifications request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device1
and a set event notifications oslp message is sent to device device1 should be true
and an ovl set event notifications result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue
device1 LIGHT_EVENTS, TARIFF_EVENTS true OK
scenario success input values device notifications ismessagesent result description
given a valid set event notifications request with device1 and LIGHT_EVENTS, TARIFF_EVENTS
and the set event notifications request refers to an existing device device1 that will always respond OK
and the set event notifications request refers to an existing organisation that is authorized
when the set event notifications request is received on OSGP
then the set event notifications request should return an async response with a correlationId and deviceId device1
and a set event notifications oslp message is sent to device device1 should be true
and an ovl set event notifications result message with result OK and description should be sent to the ovl out queue

Scenario: Receive A Get Set event notifications Response Request

scenario get set event notifications response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given a get set event notifications response request with correlationId @correlationid and deviceId @deviceid
and a set event notifications response message with correlationId @correlationid, deviceId @deviceid2, qresult @qresult and qdescription @qdescription is found in the queue @isfound
when the get set event notifications response request is received
then the get set event notifications response request should return a set event notifications response with result @result and description @description

get set event notifications response input values
correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
cid-01 dvc-01 true dvc-01 OK OK
scenario get set event notifications response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given a get set event notifications response request with correlationId cid-01 and deviceId dvc-01
and a set event notifications response message with correlationId cid-01, deviceId dvc-01, qresult OK and qdescription is found in the queue true
when the get set event notifications response request is received
then the get set event notifications response request should return a set event notifications response with result OK and description
cid-02 dvc-01 false NOT_FOUND
scenario get set event notifications response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given a get set event notifications response request with correlationId cid-02 and deviceId dvc-01
and a set event notifications response message with correlationId cid-02, deviceId , qresult and qdescription is found in the queue false
when the get set event notifications response request is received
then the get set event notifications response request should return a set event notifications response with result NOT_FOUND and description
cid-03 dvc-01 true dvc-01 NOT_OK VALIDATION ERROR NOT_OK VALIDATION ERROR
scenario get set event notifications response input values correlationid deviceid isfound deviceid2 qresult qdescription result description
given a get set event notifications response request with correlationId cid-03 and deviceId dvc-01
and a set event notifications response message with correlationId cid-03, deviceId dvc-01, qresult NOT_OK and qdescription VALIDATION ERROR is found in the queue true
when the get set event notifications response request is received
then the get set event notifications response request should return a set event notifications response with result NOT_OK and description VALIDATION ERROR

Parameters:

  • correlationId: correlation Id returned from a set event notifications request
  • content: message content
  • result: OK or exception


  • Expand All
  • Collapse All

com.alliander.osgp.acceptancetests
